overview: We partnered with the heroes of faith of today to discover the reasons that are holding us back from bringing hope, healing and restoration to this broken world and to give practical strategies to help you overcome them to reach our hurting world. You can expect insight from heroes like Bill Johnson, Heidi Baker, Kris Vallotton, Todd White, Shawn Bolz, Randy Clark and many more.  In order to keep the movie real and practical we will show you how ordinary Christians bring light to dark places so you would know step by step on how to do it yourself. The movie will include footage of outreaches and street evangelism in Asia, the U.S. and Europe. We also have exclusive footage from the historical Azusa Now event, where over a 100,000 people were involved to seek the greatest move of God this world has ever seen.
tagline: We owe the world an encounter with God
title: Christ in You: The Movie
